body: Hi all, this is problably an easy question, but i am still struggling on it. I am running DF simulations, and i am using the Ladybug_countour mesh component to plot the results with the isocurves. My problem is that the values of the isocurves are plotted not always in the same way: sometime parallel to the curves, sometime perpendicular. In the following case, for example, i would like to turn the values of 90°(to get them parallel to the curves). [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/wEynLvGyhyShqD6mJeYCqEPVNp*Rjg6V6-JA1PgOaDhHWEJarA9-VYwT2OXzTI-GM-uwUhnpuTO9alodw3rLaYtjYFAjjXlg/0.JPG) in order to have something like this: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/wEynLvGyhyT52P9J*2DOd0meNWdS0KpiiagGl4Bi*T*s0sroFK0BC1GlROXYQhCHInNWn0d4GST5vFNQQthUZA9U471JMSzT/1.JPG) How can i do that (without baking them)?? Thanks in advance Claudia
